item.description:
Author: Sridevi Miriyala

This features testes, if a transfer is blocked when position of a participant exceeds the Net Debit Cap for the transfer amount.

STEPS:

GET Limits
GET Positions for payer and payee
set amount=(NDC-P) + 10
POST Quotes - send to payee that responds COMMITTED
POST Transfers-Prepare
      -Payerfsp should get error msg "insufficient liquidity in payerfsp to perform transfer " 
GET positions - 
  current payer position = prev position 
  current payee position = prev position 
(Failure of the transfer due to insufficient liquidity from payerfsp, results no change in positions)

item.description:
Author: Sridevi Miriyala

This is to test how the position of payerfsp and payeefsp change when a transfer happens. Here I'm capturing positions of both FSP's before and after transfer and comparing the difference in position is equal to the transfer amount.

GET Limits
GET Positions for payer and payee
set amount=(NDC-P)-10
POST Quotes - send to payee that responds COMMITTED
POST Transfers-Prepare
POST Transfers-Fulfil - Payerfsp and payeefsp shd get Transfer COMMITTED status msgs
GET positions - 
  payer position = prev position + amount
  payee position = prev position - amount

item.description:
GET Limits
GET Positions for payer and payee
set amount=(NDC-P) - 10
POST Quotes - send to payee that responds ABORTED
POST Transfers-Prepare
GET position of payerfsp - make sure current position = prev position + amount
POST Transfers-fulfil with ABORT 
   Both FSP's should be notified of the ABORT status of the transfer.
GET positions - 
  current payer position = prev position 
  current payee position = prev position 
(Failure of the transfer due to transfer ABORT by payeefsp, results no change in final positions, although there is an increase in payerfsp position when transfer at reserved state)

Author: Sridevi Miriyala

This feature shows the movement of the funds per transfer of a DFSP.
Initial positions are always set to "0"
The increase in the position shows the available funds are less to transact.
The decrease in the position shows the there are more funds available to transact.
Always need to check with Net Debit Cap.
position never be greater than NDC.
Before processing the transfer, this is the basic check that the switch performs on the transfer amount to the current position

current position + transfer amount <= NDC.
if it is exceeding, transfer should be blocked.

item.description:
Send a transfer-prepare from payerfsp to payeefsp
Do not send transfer-fulfil from payeefsp.

Send a duplicate transfer-prepare with same params.
check the simulator logs to make sure that there should not be any response for the duplicate transfer when the actual transfer is not at terminal state which means neither committed nor aborted but in process.

This is same as sending duplicate transfer when actual transfer is at ABORTED state.

item.name: original_transfer_at_committed
item.description:
Send a transfer-prepare from payerfsp to payeefsp
Send tranfer-fulfil with "COMMITTED" from payeefsp to payerfsp
Transfer Must be successful - Both FSP's shd be notified.
Send a duplicate transfer-prepare with same params.
check the simulator logs to make sure the response for the duplicate transfer must be the same response from the actual transfer which is already committed.

response:
2018-10-12 06:11:19.266  INFO 7240 --- [io-8444-exec-10] com.mojaloop.fsp.PayerFsp                : In Payerfsp. TransferId: 3f5ffe54-583c-4d43-ba9e-824615f84e1c Body: {"transferId":"3f5ffe54-583c-4d43-ba9e-824615f84e1c","amount":{"currency":"USD","amount":"99.00"},"transferState":"COMMITTED","completedTimestamp":"2018-10-12T06:10:41.000Z","ilpPacket":"","fulfilment":"Pum19KP9S4tuLsR4Hlrcx8ThydepCIApVpG9A7IWcU0","condition":"qpx2bqg7LdpQK_-XxRfYv6bAuc-NeeVyWiFr2MkFX7M","expiration":"2018-10-20T04:24:01.000Z","extensionList":{"extension":[]}}

item.name: original_transfer_not_in_terminal_state_and_payee_sending_invalid_fulfilments_before_timeout_period

request.description:
with invalid fulfilment within expiry time.
Get the error msg from payeefsp simulator log and compare it with the expected error msg.

This duplicate request must be ignored.
No response shd be noticed in payerfsp.

item.description:
Send a transfer-prepare from payerfsp to payeefsp 
send transfer-fulfil from payeefsp with invalid fulfilments within expiry time.
 - check payeefsp simulator logs for an error msg.
Send a duplicate transfer-prepare with same params.
This duplicate transfer request should be ignored. check the simulator logs to make sure that there should not be any response for the duplicate transfer when the actual transfer is not at terminal state which means neither committed nor aborted but in process.

item.name: Record Funds Out Prepare&Reserve- payerfsp Copy
